snippet: The country needs decisive reforms to revive growth, control inflation and support the rupee.
abstract: Editorial holds India's once booming economy is sliding into a deep slump; warns unless Prime Min Manmohan Singh's government reforms the economy, including providing welfare benefits directly to families and granting licenses to new banks, India will fall far short of its potential.
lead_paragraph: The country needs decisive reforms to revive growth, control inflation and support the rupee.
